name: drag_spawn_03
text: Court mage to the Nest of Thorns am I.
text_simple: court mage to the nest of thorns am i

name: drag_begin_01
text: I am sworn to turn the tide where ere I can.
text_simple: i am sworn to turn the tide where ere i can

name: drag_begin_02
text: Even on this fallen field, I dedicate my powers to the lofty Skywrath.
text_simple: even on this fallen field i dedicate my powers to the lofty skywrath

name: drag_firstblood_01
text: I would give all this, and my blood too if it meant the Skywrath Scion were restored!
text_simple: i would give all this and my blood too if it meant the skywrath scion were restored

name: drag_move_07
text: You'll have no cause to question me.
text_simple: youll have no cause to question me

name: drag_move_10
text: As it is in my power.
text_simple: as it is in my power

name: drag_attack_06
text: I'll dash them to the earth.
text_simple: ill dash them to the earth

name: drag_attack_14
text: I'll dash them to the ground.
text_simple: ill dash them to the ground

name: drag_cast_02
text: The skies are dark with Skywrath power!
text_simple: the skies are dark with skywrath power

name: drag_cast_03
text: Fly where you will, I will follow you there!

criteria: Custom Isskywrath_mage IsSkyLoadoutSpawn|CastExecute Isskywrath_mage IsSkyAncientSeal Chance_25%

name: drag_ancient_seal_02
text: The Seal of Avilliva upon you!
text_simple: the seal of avilliva upon you

name: drag_mystic_flare_02
text: The light of pain upon you!
text_simple: the light of pain upon you

name: drag_levelup_01
text: From tip to tip my wings cover the sky!
text_simple: from tip to tip my wings cover the sky

name: drag_levelup_03
text: The truth of my heart shall be writ upon the skies.
text_simple: the truth of my heart shall be writ upon the skies

name: drag_levelup_04
text: A lesser being would grow dizzy at such heights.
text_simple: a lesser being would grow dizzy at such heights

name: drag_levelup_05
text: Ah, Skree'auk, your blood enthralls me!
text_simple: ah skreeauk your blood enthralls me

name: drag_levelup_06
text: In the name of my secret love I'll use this power well.
text_simple: in the name of my secret love ill use this power well

name: drag_levelup_08
text: All creation lies strewn below me!
text_simple: all creation lies strewn below me

name: drag_levelup_09
text: Ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha!
text_simple: ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha

name: drag_levelup_10
text: Ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha!
text_simple: ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha

name: drag_kill_02
text: Those who tangle with the Skywrath risk a fall from starry heights.
text_simple: those who tangle with the skywrath risk a fall from starry heights

name: drag_kill_04
text: All I do, I do in Her name.
text_simple: all i do i do in her name

name: drag_kill_05
text: I use my powers wisely. Take that as you will.
text_simple: i use my powers wisely take that as you will

name: drag_kill_06
text: I end your life that something good may begin.
text_simple: i end your life that something good may begin

name: drag_kill_07
text: Think of it as a new beginning.
text_simple: think of it as a new beginning

name: drag_kill_08
text: I gave your death some thought, believe me.
text_simple: i gave your death some thought believe me

name: drag_kill_09
text: I do not kill you lightly. But still, you are dead.
text_simple: i do not kill you lightly but still you are dead

name: drag_kill_10
text: I am a tool of the greater good. What does that make you?
text_simple: i am a tool of the greater good what does that make you

name: drag_kill_11
text: Ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha!
text_simple: ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha

name: drag_kill_12
text: Ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha!
text_simple: ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha

name: drag_rival_01
text: My secret love dies with you.
text_simple: my secret love dies with you

name: drag_rival_02
text: I die, but my love lives on...
text_simple: i die but my love lives on

name: drag_rival_03
text: It was all I could give you, Sweet Spirit.
text_simple: it was all i could give you sweet spirit

name: drag_rival_04
text: Be released from your suffering, Vengeful One.
text_simple: be released from your suffering vengeful one

name: drag_rival_05
text: You must take your magic more seriously.
text_simple: you must take your magic more seriously

name: drag_rival_06
text: I think you will remember me now, eh?
text_simple: i think you will remember me now eh

name: drag_rival_07
text: Your bookish ways have made you myopic.
text_simple: your bookish ways have made you myopic

name: drag_rival_08
text: I put you down unfinished, like a terrible book, heh heh.
text_simple: i put you down unfinished like a terrible book heh heh

name: drag_rival_09
text: Such wings should not be allowed so near the heavens.
text_simple: such wings should not be allowed so near the heavens

name: drag_rival_10
text: One source of aerial pollution curtailed.
text_simple: one source of aerial pollution curtailed

name: drag_rival_11
text: How dare you sport wings when others more deserving have lost theirs.
text_simple: how dare you sport wings when others more deserving have lost theirs

name: drag_rival_12
text: There dies the most repugnant of them all!
text_simple: there dies the most repugnant of them all

name: drag_rival_13
text: Your wards were no match for the Skywrath!
text_simple: your wards were no match for the skywrath

name: drag_rival_14
text: A low creature indeed was Pugna!
text_simple: a low creature indeed was pugna

name: drag_ally_01
text: Ah, my heart, my wings, let us fly.
text_simple: ah my heart my wings let us fly
pretty_criteria: Vengeful Spirit is nearby at between 1 minute and 11 minutes in

name: drag_ally_02
text: Vengeful Spirit, let us work to see you avenged.
text_simple: vengeful spirit let us work to see you avenged
pretty_criteria: Vengeful Spirit is nearby at between 1 minute and 11 minutes in

name: drag_ally_03
text: May I join you in seeking your revenge?
text_simple: may i join you in seeking your revenge
pretty_criteria: Vengeful Spirit is nearby at between 1 minute and 11 minutes in

name: drag_ally_04
text: If you will deign to notice me, Invoker, I believe we can learn from each other.
text_simple: if you will deign to notice me invoker i believe we can learn from each other
pretty_criteria: Invoker is nearby at between 1 minute and 11 minutes in

name: drag_ally_05
text: Invoker, do not pretend you have forgotten me, eh?

pretty_criteria: Invoker is nearby at between 1 minute and 11 minutes in

name: drag_ally_06
pretty_criteria: Rubick is nearby at between 1 minute and 11 minutes in

name: drag_ally_07
text: My heart is heavy, Rubick. It is a relief to see yours so light.
text_simple: my heart is heavy rubick it is a relief to see yours so light
pretty_criteria: Rubick is nearby at between 1 minute and 11 minutes in

name: drag_ally_08
text: Your grimoire, does it say how this will end?
text_simple: your grimoire does it say how this will end

name: drag_ally_09
text: Warlock, I hope you don't fight like a librarian.
text_simple: warlock i hope you dont fight like a librarian

name: drag_ally_10
text: Who is that down there? Well hello! It's Pugna!
text_simple: who is that down there well hello its pugna

name: drag_death_03
text: Wings of light, carry me off.
text_simple: wings of light carry me off

name: drag_death_06
text: My death means nothing next to hers!
text_simple: my death means nothing next to hers

name: drag_death_08
text: Never to restore Her to the Nest of Thorns!
text_simple: never to restore her to the nest of thorns

name: drag_death_09
text: The Ghastly Eyrie will miss me not.
text_simple: the ghastly eyrie will miss me not

name: drag_death_10
text: To fall from such a height...
text_simple: to fall from such a height

name: drag_fastres_01
text: That my friend was a mistake.
text_simple: that my friend was a mistake

name: drag_respawn_02
text: Never more to see my Skywrath home? That would be worse than any death.
text_simple: never more to see my skywrath home that would be worse than any death

name: drag_respawn_03
text: Small suffering compared to that of some I know.
text_simple: small suffering compared to that of some i know

name: drag_respawn_04
text: Power comes from the heart, and now mine beats anew.
text_simple: power comes from the heart and now mine beats anew

name: drag_respawn_05
text: I rededicate my magic to the Nest of Thorns.
text_simple: i rededicate my magic to the nest of thorns

name: drag_respawn_06
text: The hot winds of hell I fear not for they carry me to Skywrath heaven!
text_simple: the hot winds of hell i fear not for they carry me to skywrath heaven

name: drag_respawn_07
text: The Ghastly Eyrie waits in readiness.
text_simple: the ghastly eyrie waits in readiness

name: drag_respawn_08
text: Revenge, always before me, before all else.
text_simple: revenge always before me before all else

name: drag_respawn_09
text: If my death can help restore her to the Eyrie, it is worth every sacrifice.
text_simple: if my death can help restore her to the eyrie it is worth every sacrifice

name: drag_respawn_10
text: I live not for myself, dear one, but in honor of your loss.
text_simple: i live not for myself dear one but in honor of your loss
